description: This table contains information about items related to surgery, including: primary surgeon, procedure, location, and case and log status.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: CS_SURG_SURGEON_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the primary surgeon for the surgery, stored here so that it can be synched across deployments to be shown in the chart review.

columns.name: CS_SURG_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the primary procedure for the surgery, stored here so that it can be synched across deployments to be shown in the chart review.

columns.name: CS_SURG_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: CS_SURG_LOCATION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgery location, stored here so that it can be synched across deployments to be shown in the chart review.

columns.name: CS_SURG_CASE_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The case status category number for the associated surgery, stored here so that it can be synched across deployments to be shown in the chart review.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Scheduled


Canceled


Not Scheduled


Missing Information


Voided


Pending


Arrived


Completed


No Show


Pending Unscheduled

columns.name: CS_SURG_LOG_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The log status category number for the associated surgery, stored here so that it can be synched across deployments to be shown in the chart review.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Missing Information


Posted


Unposted


Voided


Completed


Canceled

columns.name: CS_SURG_EAP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the primary procedure for the surgery, stored here so that it can be synced across deployments to be shown in the chart review.

columns.name: CS_SURG_PROC_FRTXT
columns.description: The procedure name as exactly ordered by the surgeon/provider, stored here so that it can be synced across deployments to be shown in the chart review.

columns.name: CS_SURG_PROC_LAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The procedure laterality, stored here so that it can be synced across deployments to be shown in the chart review.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Left


Right


Bilateral


N/A


Default

columns.name: CS_SURG_SCHED_DTTM
columns.description: The procedure scheduled time, stored here so that it can be synced across deployments to be shown in the chart review.

columns.name: CS_SURG_PROC_CMT
columns.description: The procedure comments, stored here so that it can be synced across deployments to be shown in the chart review.

columns.name: CS_SURG_NOT_PERF_YN
columns.description:
The flag determining if the surgery was marked as procedure not performed, stored here so that it can be synced across deployments.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CS_SURG_CASE_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the class of the case (either Inpatient or Outpatient), stored here so that the class of the case can be determined across deployments.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Inpatient


Outpatient


Cannot Be Determined
